name: Western Showdown
description:
In an old town out West, Rattlesnake Jake’s band of outlaws invade and raid the area. It’s up to you to beat the swarm of bandits, find the man himself, and beat him at his own game in order to save the innocent folk of this town. Will you succeed and scare them off or will you fail and leave the town in utter turmoil? 

As a team of two, an artist and new game dev created a carnival inspired shooter mystery for their first game jam! 

All art was digitally drawn for this jam. The sound effects were a mix of created and downloaded from free-to-use sources.

**Note** plays best in full screen :)
